data.name: Letters - a written adventure Soundtrack
data.detailed_description:
Get the OST for Letters - a written adventure composed by the talented Michel Barengo, including grungy guitar riffs by Valentin Baumgartner.

Go on a nostalgia trip ranging from bitter-sweet childhood memories to the emotional rollercoaster of teenagehood.
